about_the_game:
Including both the classic staples such as a snake, wolf or rat, as well as unique representations of a mushroom, flower creature or leaf, this gently-colored yet beautiful set is there to help you enhance the storyline of any fantasy world on your map!
Whether you're on a lookout for a new enemy rotation or need an inspiration boost for constructing your game's lore, Spirits of Nature: Enemy Pack is a fantastic addition to your growing library of RPG Maker Resources and beyond!

Features:
  • 11 side-view battlers.
  • 9 front-view battlers.
  • All comes in 3 colors (Total of 60 graphics!)
  • All comes in shadow or non-shadow graphics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: From a cute bunny to an enchanting nature spirit, Spirits of Nature: Enemy Pack is a wonderful graphic pack to start a journey into a mysterious world of fantasy and nature!
